name: Cookie Horror Ahoy
description:
"What is this?" You thought to yourself as you skipped a cringy chips ahoy ad.  But a few miles down the road and you're out of gas. On the radio you hear reports of a series of murders in a nearby forest, by... a cookie?. Can you stop this cookie? Or will you be its next victim....

Note: (This is my first game and it was made in two days because I wanted to get it out before the meme dies, so please comment if there are any bugs or glitches.)

Overview:

- Mild horror elements - 5 unique endings - linear playstyle -

Game completion time: 5-10 minutes.
